Content:
[ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_ChanceOnTurn]% chance to gain Madness when your turn ends.
Madness grants you bonuses and full control over your actions.

<font color='#C7A758'>When <font color='#FF0000'>disabled</font> (Knocked Down, Stunned, etc), <font color='#FFAB00'>incoming damage is reduced by [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_StunDefense_DamageReduction]%</font>.</font>

<font color='#C7A758'>When your turn ends, harmful damage-over-time statuses are <font color='#4197E2'>cleansed</font>, restoring <font color='#97FBFF'>[ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_ImmuneBoost_HealPercentage]% Vitality</font> per status.</font>
<font color='#C7A758'>Damaging <font color='#FE6E27'>fire spells</font> have a [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_CursedFire_Chance]% chance to apply <font color='#B823CB'>Necrofire</font>.</font>
<font color='#C7A758'><font color='#4197E2'>[Key:Rain_Water_DisplayName]</font> creates a mild <font color='#7D71D9'>lightning storm</font> at the target location.</font>
